title: The Keeper's Descent
purpose: Follow Elias's journey from dutiful keeper to horrified guardian of an ancient secret

scenes.title: The Anomaly
scenes.purpose: Establish Elias's isolation and introduce the first sign something is wrong
scenes.conflict: Strange sounds from the ocean disrupt his morning routine

scenes.title: Forbidden Records
scenes.purpose: Elias discovers clues about previous keepers and the lighthouse's true purpose
scenes.conflict: Hidden journals reveal disturbing patterns and warnings

scenes.title: What Lies Beneath
scenes.purpose: Elias witnesses something massive moving in the deep waters
scenes.conflict: The light flickers and something stirs in the abyss

scenes.title: The Ancient Sleeper
scenes.purpose: Elias learns the full horror of what the lighthouse keeps dormant
scenes.conflict: Equipment failure threatens to wake the creature permanently

scenes.title: The Guardian's Burden
scenes.purpose: Elias accepts his role as keeper of humanity's darkest secret
scenes.setting: Lighthouse at sunrise after the storm
scenes.conflict: Internal struggle between escape and duty to mankind

title: The Solitary Vigil
purpose: Explore how isolation and forbidden knowledge drive Elias toward the edge of sanity

scenes.title: Cracks in the Pattern
scenes.purpose: Show Elias's deteriorating mental state through disrupted daily rituals
scenes.conflict: Paranoia and sleeplessness affect his ability to maintain the light

scenes.title: The Deep Calls
scenes.purpose: Elias begins hearing things that may or may not be real
scenes.conflict: Distinguishing between madness and supernatural influence

scenes.title: The Last Keeper's Fate
scenes.purpose: Elias finds evidence of what happened to the previous lighthouse keeper
scenes.conflict: Confronting the price of knowledge and the fate that awaits him

scenes.title: The Light Goes Out
scenes.purpose: Elias faces the ultimate test when the light fails
scenes.setting: Lighthouse lamp room during equipment malfunction
scenes.conflict: Choosing between personal salvation and global catastrophe

scenes.title: Eternal Vigil
scenes.purpose: Elias embraces his role as guardian, understanding the true cost
scenes.setting: Lighthouse at dawn, one year later
